FontFaceSetCheck.summary: The check() method of the returns true if you can render some text using the given font specification without attempting to use any fonts in this FontFaceSet that are not yet fully loaded. This means you can use the font specification without causing a font swap.
FontFaceSetCheck.returns: A value that is true if rendering text with the given font specification will not attempt to use any fonts in this FontFaceSet that are not yet fully loaded.This means that all fonts in this FontFaceSet that are matched by the given font specification have a status property set to "loaded".Otherwise, this function returns false.
